medium: Photomontage and engineered working drawings on mylar
title: Drawing, from Minneapolis Project Drawings
marks: Signature; Date on each: [Dale Eldred, Minneapolis Project, 1983]
description: drawings commisioned by the Minneapolis Society of Fine Arts for its centennial in 1983.  Nos. 51-75 relate to the Floating Diffraction Field installed on Lake Calhoun as part of Eldred\'s one man show.
